tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Kavitha is very sweet and friendly. From my first month to till my delivery she was the one handling me.. I was totally happy with her.. she helped me in all my health issue.. when ever I call her, she never hesitate to answer my call and give me all possible solution for my questions. I was blind when I choose her.. but after visit her first time, really got a hope on her.. I really recommend to all the mom to be...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited madam DR Kavitha P M for our pregnency test. From the day one she has been a great support throught my pregnancy. Very professional and kind hearted. She made us  enjoy that period. She assisted us personally also. We had very very good experience with her. Its pleassure to get such a humble and caring doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ********** She takes complete care of us and is very approachable and is patient in hearing. Even our parents found her very caring and friendly during the delivery. She consults other doctors and shares the overall feedback for any other aliments. She made the delivery experience less stressful and we are very happy with her medications.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to Cloudnine as it was near to my place and went randomly as I wasn't sure about pregnancy. On calling Cloudnine Jayanagar branch I was given appointment with Dr. Kavitha PM , I checked couple of positive reviews and met this Doctor and got to know that I am pregnant. Initially she was very positive and friendly and assisted me as I had extreme nausea. Eventually whenever I would ask the doctor about the probability of normal delivery I was not given any positive answer and told that we will tell you when you need to get admitted as I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes which was very mild and controlled after I was referred to the specialist who monitored my case closely and told that it is controlled and I need not worry . I had my growth scan during 32nd week where I was told that baby's weight is less and I might have to do another scan soon, deliver early and keep the baby in NICU. I was extremely worried hearing this as I am quite healthy otherwise and baby's activity in womb was also good. I wasn't convinced with whatever she told hence I sent my reports to my family doctor in my hometown.* *** *** *** ******* *** **** **** ***** ** ** ****** **** ****** ****** *** ** ******** ** ******* *** **** ** ***** I wanted to change the hospital as well as doctor as the hospital was very unprofessional during pandemic *** ****** *** **** ********* Due to Covid 19 only the patient was allowed to see the doctor hence my husband wasn't allowed to meet the doctor. She was very negative in the end and didn't have any empathy towards a pregnant women. ** ****** ****** **** ** **** * ******** *** *** ****** *** *** ******** I changed the hospital as well as doctor *** ********* *** ***** ******* ** ****** ****** ** *** ** ** ******** ********* ******** ** *** ***** ** ******* ** *** ************* It was perhaps the best decision I took ** *** *** **** ******** *** ****** ***** ** ** **** *** **** *** ** ******* **** ********* ******** * *** * **** **** ********* *** ********* * ******* **** *** ******** ** **** **** ** ****** ****** ***** *** ***** ******** ***** *** ***** *** **** ************ ** ***** *** ****** ******** **** ** ******** ***** *** ******* ** *** ******** Please be very mindful before choosing Cloudnine or Dr. Kavitha ** **** **** ** **** **** ********* ******** *** ******* **** ****** ** ********* ******* *** ******* I don't recommend this Doctor and this hospital at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ********** ** ** ******* ****** **** ** **** she is very friendly wid free of cruelty person she is available at the tym of emergencies n em very thankful to her *** *** ***** ** **** ****** when I call her n share my problem she has never ignored any of my prob on call n she was der with me in labour room frm 3am by the time I delivered it was 7am but she was wid me very rare we see this kind of doctors I really loved my journey of pregnancy.....I suggest all the moms to be to choose  n trust dr.kavitha PM blindly n consult her.....

tags: None
review: I was asked to consult Dr.Kavitha when my regular doctor went on vacation close to my due date.Doctor Kavitha is very patient and sweet and she understood that a last minute change of doctor could cause a lot of anxiety in patients.As far as my delivery was concerned there were no problems and she was very confident in handling it.I thano her for ensuring that i delivered a healthy baby with no complications!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We found Dr Kavitha to be very friendly and patient. Unlike other doctors she was not at all in hurry. She patiently addressed all our queries and concerns. When we asked for some supplements she said she doesn't recommend supplements unnecessarily.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor's communication. She treated well..I liked the way she communicate with the patients . Even the hospital ambiance is clean.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Good Experience with complete satisfaction about consultation also happy with less waiting time. Overall it's good.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. was not available after we returned back taking scan report. Later we were forced to consult with a duty doctor. No appointment timekeeping!
